text: Mahini'am nu ghata vadha dena ulaghana hai ate isa tar'ham karana nala alaha di ulaghana karana vale gumarahi vica painde hana. Uha kise sala harama de mahine nu halala bana lainde hana ate kise sala usa nu harama kara dide hana tam ki alaha de harama kite mahini'am di ginati puri karake usa de nala harama kite ho'e nu halala kara laina. Unham de mare kama unham la'i manamohaka bana dite ga'e hana. Alaha inakari'am nu raha nahim vikha'unda
